reviewText: An extremely powerful piece by Donnie L. Betts!  It was worth every penny I  paid!  The poetry and music of Oscar Brown Jr.  has inspired me since I first heard him in 1962.

LOVE IT LOVE IT LOVE IT WISH THERE WERE MORE STAAAARS.......Just Love Him and Miss Him tremendously.
Never forgotten always near. R.I.P.
Glad to get this documentary of Oscar. It was lively and uplifting!
Mr Oscar Brown Jr is one of the great entertainer of all times, and there are very videos of him performing his multi talents.
